text: I, the Jury is a 1982 American crime drama movie directed by Richard T. Heffron and is the second adaption of the 1947 novel of the same name by Mickey Spillane. It stars Armand Assante, Barbara Carrera, Laurene Landon, Alan King, Geoffrey Lewis, Judson Scott, Paul Sorvino and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 crime drama movies Category:1982 mystery movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies directed by Richard T. Heffron
title: I, the Jury (1982 movie)
